mapper.sql: status AS "status",sku_id AS "skuId", detail_id AS "detailId",inventory_id AS "inventoryId" ,inkind_id AS "inkindId", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_inventory_detail where 1 = 1
and detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.detailId},'%')
and inkind_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inkindId},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
